value: The Federico Wattenberg Center for Vaccean Studies (CEVFW) at the University of Valladolid is dedicated to the study of the Vaccean civilization. It is located in the Plaza Mayor of Padilla de Duero; the building was originally an old blacksmith's shop, acquired by the University in 2000. With the necessary renovations, it was transformed into a residence for archaeologists and a visitor reception center for the archaeological site.
